head.title: property-case
head.description:
property-case

Specify lowercase or uppercase for properties.

Options

string: "lower"|"upper"

"lower"

The following patterns are…

body:
#property-case

Specify lowercase or uppercase for properties.

    a { width: 1px; }
/**     ↑
 * These properties */

#Options

string: "lower"|"upper"

#"lower"

The following patterns are considered warnings:

a {
  Width: 1px
}
a {
  WIDTH: 1px
}
a {
  widtH: 1px
}
a {
  border-Radius: 5px;
}
a { 
  -WEBKIT-animation-duration: 3s; 
}
@media screen and (orientation: landscape) { 
  WiDtH: 500px; 
}

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

a {
  width: 1px
}
a {
  border-radius: 5px;
}
a { 
  -webkit-animation-duration: 3s; 
}
@media screen and (orientation: landscape) { 
  width: 500px; 
}

#"upper"

The following patterns are considered warnings:

a {
  Width: 1px
}
a {
  width: 1px
}
a {
  widtH: 1px
}
a {
  border-Radius: 5px;
}
a { 
  -WEBKIT-animation-duration: 3s; 
}
@media screen and (orientation: landscape) { 
  WiDtH: 500px; 
}

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

a {
  WIDTH: 1px
}
a {
  BORDER-RADIUS: 5px;
}
a { 
  -WEBKIT-ANIMATION-DURATION: 3s; 
}
@media screen and (orientation: landscape) { 
  WIDTH: 500px; 
}
